no_holders.all_empty: No members posted an announcement yet. Here you will see the addresses of members who have posted their candidacy. Be the first to post an announcement.

security_council.title: Security Council
security_council.message: There are no multisig members yet. Here you will see the addresses of members who can create proposals.

details.title: Details
details.delegation_description: Proposals submitted to the community can be vetoed by token holders. Additionally, token holders can opt to delegate their voting power to delegates.
details.security_council_description: Proposals are created by the Security Council. When its members approve one, the proposal is forwarded to the community veto phase for ratification.

home.description: A beautiful DAO experience in a simple template that you can customize. Get started by connecting your wallet and selecting a plugin from the menu.

body.label: Body
body.placeholder: A description of what the proposal is all about

resources.title: Resources
resources.empty: There are no resources yet. Click the button below to add the first one.

actions.empty: The proposal has no actions defined yet. Select a type of action to add to the proposal.
